attributes.action: Give a knighthood to Captain Tom Moore
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore is a true inspiration and a role model for all our younger generations. After raising over £12 million for the NHS at this time serving his country once again after serving in World War 2.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
